welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hollywood, where the magic of the movies comes to life! Get ready to explore the iconic landmarks, vibrant culture, and rich history this city is famous for and make unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Tijuana Flats
restaurants.description: Tijuana Flats is a burrito restaurant located in Hollywood.

restaurants.name: The Hollywood Donut Factory
restaurants.description: The Hollywood Donut Factory is a donut shop located in Hollywood.

restaurants.name: Miller's Ale House
restaurants.description: Miller's Ale House is a restaurant located in Hollywood.
restaurants.address: 3215 Oakwood Blvd (at Oakwood Plaza), Hollywood, FL 33020

restaurants.name: Go Bistro
restaurants.description: Go Bistro is a sushi restaurant located in Hollywood.

restaurants.name: Joe's Wood Grill
restaurants.description: Joe's Wood Grill is a bbq joint located in Dania Beach.
restaurants.address: 1504 S Federal Hwy, Dania Beach, FL 33004

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers a more personalized and luxurious experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport caters to the needs of private jet owners and passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale–Hollywood International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Fort Lauderdale–Hollywood International Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A terminal at Fort Lauderdale–Hollywood International Airport, primarily used by low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Fort Lauderdale–Hollywood International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Public Airport houses all the necessary amenities for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Public Airport serves as the gateway for travelers arriving from or departing to other countries. It features duty-free shops, immigration and customs facilities, and international lounges.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Public Airport is reserved for private and charter flights. It offers exclusive services and amenities for VIP travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport with a simple registration process.
